Message
About the job
We are seeking a highly skilled .NET Developer to design, develop, and maintain software applications. This role is ideal for a developer who excels at troubleshooting, integrating complex solutions, and working within distributed messaging environments.


Key Responsibilities
Develop & Implement: Design, test, and maintain software programs and databases using the .NET framework.
Asynchronous Integration: Implement and manage messaging patterns to ensure reliable communication between systems and applications.
Technical Troubleshooting: Identify software issues, perform root cause analysis, and resolve problems promptly.
System Maintenance: Integrate new software products with existing applications and maintain data using established procedures.
Operational Excellence: Execute Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for development tasks and perform code check-ins, merges, and quality validation.
Collaboration: Participate in an agile environment, providing project updates to managers and stakeholders while contributing to overall team success.
Reporting: Create ad-hoc queries for audits or special requests as needed.


Skills & Experience
Messaging Systems Requirement: Candidates must have professional experience with at least one of the following (listed in order of preference):
Azure Service Bus (Highly Preferred)
Apache Kafka
RabbitMQ


Core Development:

Experience: Minimum 5 years of professional experience with C#, .NET, MVC, and APIs.
Database: Strong knowledge of SQL Server programming, integration, and database design.
Web Tech: Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and programming web applications.
Tools: Experience with Git/TFS, MS Office Suite, and Windows OS.
